content:
Let's add one more event to your calendar. You mentioned attending a smaller concert at the Bowery Ballroom in Manhattan on February 20th to see mxmtoon. Let's add that to your calendar as a past event.

**Adding the mxmtoon concert:**

* Open your "Concerts" calendar
* Click on the date February 20th
* Click on the "Create" button
* Enter the event details:
	+ Title: mxmtoon
	+ Location: Bowery Ballroom, Manhattan
	+ Time: [Time of the event] (if you remember it)
	+ Description: Add notes about the event, like "Intimate setting", "Impressed by her vocal range", or "Bought her EP at the merch table"
	+ All-day event: Since this is a past event, you can check the "All-day" box to indicate it's a completed event
* Click "Save"

Now
